After this she gets kicked out with all her stuff and she goes back to the new guy asking him to fuck her again. After that happens she gets kicked out because the new guy found a better "younger" girl than her. There's a time skip then we see her struggling but still afloat the broke zone, she then gets to see her ex-husband with his new girl.
